availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Curtis, Jr. (Assistant Adjutant General under General J.G. Foster. )

body.p: Assistant Adjutant General under General J. G. Foster from c1864 to February 10, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Official Army Register for 1866. Published by Order of the Secretary of War, in Compliance with the Resolution of the Senate of December 13, 1815, and Resolutions of the House of Representatives Dated February 1, 1830, and August 30, 1842, (Washington, D.C.: Adjutant General's Office, 1866), p. 105.
KYR-0002-033-0009.
